data.title: Charles Darwin
data.meta_description: Charles Darwin is a famous scientist who authored The Origin of Species.
data.text:
Charles Darwin Unnamed actor as Charles Darwin in Mr. Burns' campaign infomercial Character Information

Gender: Male ♂ Status: Deceased Hair: Gray (portrayed as white) Occupation: Scientist First appearance: "Two Cars in Every Garage and Three Eyes on Every Fish" Voiced by: Harry Shearer

Charles Darwin is a famous scientist who authored The Origin of Species.

History[edit]

An actor portraying him appears on TV to promote Mr. Burn's running for governor of Springfield's state.[1] In an anti-evolution documentary, he is portrayed as evil and makes out with Satan.[2]

Charles Darwin was one of the people on the Spuckler family tree.[3]

In an interview with Lisa, she said that her real life heroes are Charles Darwin, Bono and Gwen Stefani.[4]

Appearances[edit]

Episode – "Two Cars in Every Garage and Three Eyes on Every Fish"

Episode – "The Monkey Suit"

Episode – "Yokel Hero" (picture)

Episode – "Hardly Kirk-ing" ("Are You There Darwin? It's Me, Margaret")

Book – The Lisa Book (mentioned)

Book – Flanders' Book of Faith (mentioned)
